Title: Flajaxian Direct S3 Amazon Service Uploader
Description: Flajaxian Direct S3 Amazon Service Uploader is adapter for the Flajaxian FileUploader .NET web control designed for direct (no post back to server) asynchronous file upload to an Amazon Service of multiple files at the same time, without a page post back and with a progress bar.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Flajaxian Direct S3 Amazon Service Uploader is adapter for the Flajaxian FileUploader .NET web control designed for direct (no post back to server) asynchronous file upload to an Amazon Service of multiple files at the same time, without a page post back and with a progress bar.

Requires: http://www.codeplex.com/FlajaxianFileUpload (also free and open source)

Web Site: http://www.Flajaxian.com
Docs: http://flajaxian.com/flajaxian.com/DirectAmazonUploader1.0Help.html
